SEARCH
Package game.skills

Class Skill

java.lang.Object
game.skills.Skill
Direct Known Subclasses:
FocusSkill, GreatSlamSkill, StabStepSkill
public abstract class Skill extends Object
An abstract class that represents a skill that can be used by a game character. Subclasses of this class should implement the specific logic of how the skill is executed and what effects it has.

      public Skill(String skillName, int skillStaminaPercent)
      Constructs a new skill with the given attributes.
      Parameters:
      skillName - The name of the skill
      skillStaminaPercent - The percentage of stamina required to use the skill

  • Method Details

    • consumeStamina

      protected void consumeStamina(Actor actor, int staminaReduction)
      Decrease the stamina of the player based on the stamina required by the activated skill

      Returns:

    • setSkillCountdown

      public void setSkillCountdown(int skillCountdown)
      Sets the countdown of the skill. Useful for skill that can lasts for several turns.
      Parameters:
      skillCountdown - The countdown of the skill

    • tickSkill

      public void tickSkill(SkillWeapon weapon)
      Countdown the skill. For skill that can lasts for several turns.

    • activateSkill

    • activateSkill

      public String activateSkill(Actor actor, SkillWeapon weapon, Actor target, GameMap map, String direction)
      Activate the skill. For skill that requires a target (an attack skill).
      Returns:
      The description after activating the skill

    • deactivateSkill

      public void deactivateSkill(SkillWeapon weapon)
      Deactivate the skill. For skill that can lasts for several turns. Basically remove the effect and reset the countdown.

    • skillDescription

      public abstract String skillDescription()
      Return a description of the skill. This is for showing a description after the player activated the skill
      Returns:
      description of the skill
